articles.title: New long-necked dinosaur helps rewrite evolutionary history of sauropods in South America - Phys.org

articles.title: Ending HIV in America | NOVA - PBS
articles.description: Science has made extraordinary progress against HIV. Can innovative drugs and therapies finally end it?
articles.content: Almost 40 years after the discovery of HIV, could we be on the verge of ending the AIDS epidemic in America? As of 2019, in the US, there were only 34,000 new cases of the diseasea feat that once see… [+379 chars]
